00014 // Construction/Destruction
00016 #ifdef DEBUG_THREAD
00017 Thread::Thread(bool autostart, const SimpleString Name /* = SimpleString::EmptyString */)
00018 #else
00019 Thread::Thread(bool autostart)
00020 #endif
00021 {
00022 #ifdef DEBUG_THREAD
00023         ThreadName = Name;
00024 #endif
00025 
00026 
00027 #ifdef WIN32
00028         ThreadID = 0;
00029         ThreadHandle  = NULL;
00030         ThreadIsRunning = false;        
00031         StopWasAsked = false;
00032         
00033         // Event event;
00034 #else
00035         ThreadIsRunning = false;        
00036         StopWasAsked = false;
00037 #endif
00038         
00039         if (autostart)
00040                 StartThread();
00041 }
00042 
00043 Thread::~Thread()
00044 {
00045         if(IsRunning())
00046         {
00047                 StopThread();
00048         }
00049 }
00050 
00051 bool Thread::StartThread()
00052 {
00053         // do nothing if already running
00054         if (IsRunning())
00055                 return false;
00056 
00057         ThreadIsRunning = false;        
00058         StopWasAsked = false;
00059 
00060 #ifdef WIN32
00061         ThreadID = 0;
00062         ThreadHandle = CreateThread( NULL, 0, CallRun, (void*)this, 0, &ThreadID );
00063         return (ThreadHandle != NULL);
00064 #else
00065         pthread_attr_t attr;
00066         pthread_attr_init(&attr);
00067         pthread_attr_setdetachstate(&attr, PTHREAD_CREATE_JOINABLE);
00068         int rc = pthread_create(&m_thread, &attr, CallRun, this);
00069         pthread_attr_destroy(&attr);
00070         return (rc == 0);
00071 #endif
00072 }
00073 
00074 bool Thread::StopThread(int wait_ms)
00075 {
00076         bool ThreadStopInTime = true;
00077 
00078         if (IsRunning())
00079         {
00080                 // Notify thread !
00081                 StopWasAsked = true;                    // Notification for pseudo active waiting
00082                 StopWasAskedEvent.Signal();             // other notification
00083 
00084                 ThreadStopInTime = IsEnded.Wait(wait_ms);
00085                 if ( ThreadStopInTime == false )
00086                 {
00087                         // Timeout !!!
00088                         OmiscidError( "Thread::StopThread: Thread do not stop before timeout (%d).\n", wait_ms );
00089 #ifdef WIN32
00090                         // TerminateThread( ThreadHandle, 0 );
00091 #endif
00092                 }
00093         }
00094 
00095         return ThreadStopInTime;
00096 }
00097 
00098 #ifdef WIN32
00099 unsigned long FUNCTION_CALL_TYPE Thread::CallRun(void* ptr)
00100 #else
00101 void* Thread::CallRun(void* ptr)
00102 #endif
00103 {
00104         Thread* t = (Thread*)ptr;
00105 
00106         // init thread random generator
00107         RandomInit();
00108 
00109         // Reset stat event
00110         t->IsEnded.Reset();
00111 
00112 #ifdef DEBUG_THREAD
00113         // OmiscidTrace( "%s\n", t->ThreadName.GetStr() );
00114 #endif
00115 
00116         // Do my job
00117         t->ThreadIsRunning = true;
00118         t->Run();
00119         t->ThreadIsRunning = false;
00120 
00121 #ifdef WIN32
00122 
00123         // Close the Thread handle
00124         // CloseHandle( ThreadHandle );
00125 
00126         t->ThreadID = 0;
00127         t->ThreadHandle = NULL;
00128 #else
00129         // m_thread     : something to do with ?
00130 #endif
00131         
00132         // signal, my job is over
00133         t->IsEnded.Signal();
00134 
00135 #ifdef WIN32
00136         return 0;
00137 #else
00138         pthread_exit(NULL);
00139 #endif
00140 }
00141 
00142 void Thread::Sleep(int nb_ms)
00143 {
00144 #ifdef WIN32
00145         // Use SleepEx because accuracy of the wait time is better than with ::Sleep
00146         ::SleepEx(nb_ms, FALSE);
00147 #else
00148         usleep(nb_ms*1000);     
00149 #endif
00150 }

00152 bool Thread::IsRunning() const 
00153 { 
00154         return ThreadIsRunning;
00155 }
00156 
00157 bool Thread::StopPending() const 
00158 { 
00159         return StopWasAsked;
00160 }
00161 
00162 void Thread::WaitForStop()
00163 {
00164         StopWasAskedEvent.Wait(0);
00165 }
